name: BOSSGARD
description: WHO’S THE BOSS? It’s finally you! One big, bad, player-controlled Boss goes against a team of Vikings, each with special abilities. Enter BOSSGARD, a hectic 1 versus 5 bossfight multiplayer game in which you get to crush your friends as THE BOSS.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 940, 3.0 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti, 1 GB / Radeon R7 250, 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 680, AMD Radeon R9-280X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
